title: The Players to Bet on in the Divisional Round, Plus Danny’s Grandmother! | The Grantasy Football Podcast
description:
We break down the players to bet on and stay away from in each game of this weekend’s divisional round (4:00), before Danny Heifetz’s grandmother joins to talk about over 50 years of Giants fandom, the most attractive QB of all time, and her bone to pick with Pete Carroll (43:40)
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck
Guest: Danny’s Grandma

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
